ARABIC: وَٱلْأَنْعَٰمَ خَلَقَهَا لَكُمْ فِيهَا دِفْءٌ وَمَنَٰفِعُ وَمِنْهَا تَأْكُلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And He created livestock. There is warmth for you in them, and various uses and some you eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He created the cattle from whom you get warm clothing and (other) advantages, and some you eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He created the cattle. They are a source of clothing and food and also a variety of other benefits for you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He created cattle which provide you with clothes, food, and other benefits.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And He created cattle; in them are warm clothing and uses for you, and you eat from them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the cattle, He has created them for you; in them there is warmth (warm clothing), and numerous benefits, and you eat from them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And He created the cattle for you; you have in them warm clothing and (many) advantages, and of them do you eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And the cattle -- He created them for you; in them is warmth, and uses various, and of them you eat,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the cattle hath He created, whence ye have warm clothing and uses, and whereof ye eat;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He has created cattle for you: from them you derive food and clothing and numerous other benefits;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the cattle! He hath created them. For you in them there is warmth and other profits and of them ye eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He created the cattle, in which there is warmth for you and [other] uses, and some of them you eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And cattle He has created for you (men): from them ye derive warmth, and numerous benefits, and of their (meat) ye eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And the cattle, He has created them for you; in them there is warmth (warm clothing), and numerous benefits, and of them you eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And the cattle He created for you. In them, you have warmth and other uses, and of them you eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the livestock—He created them for you. In them are warmth and benefits for you, and of them you eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the grazing livestock He has created for you; in them is warmth and [numerous] benefits, and from them you eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [16:5] And the cattle, camels, cows and sheep (al-an‘āma, ‘cattle’, is in the accusative because of the implied verb [governing it], as explained by [the following words, khalaqahā lakum]), He created them for you, [you being] included among the number of mankind. In them there is warmth, that by which you keep warm in the way of clothes and garments, [taken] from their hairs and wools, as well as [other] uses, such as [their] offspring, milk and for you to ride, and of them you eat (the adverbial clause [wa-minhā, ‘of them’] precedes [the verb] for the purpose of [establishing harmony with] the end-rhyme [of the Qur’ānic verse]);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the cattle) i.e. the camels (hath He created, whence ye have warm clothing) made of their skin (and uses) you drink their milk and use them as a means of transport, (and whereof ye eat) and you eat their 282 meat.
